Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory691.jpg'}
{3: 'The torch that was supposed to help civilization survive the winter has turned into deadly flames.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Godwin', 3: 'Are you asking us to change our direction of research and design the Constructs for military use?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Godwin frowns at the request.'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "My research isn't for such a boring purpose. Go find Daedalus or the Polar Institute.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Humans are losing the war against the Punishing Virus. We urgently need a new weapon to bring the situation under control.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Mr. Godwin, we hope you can understand.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man used a pleading tone, but he left no room for Godwin to negotiate.'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "Even if I am to alter my field of research, the available materials aren't made for such experiments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'Now that Project Cthylla is compromised, I have no spare.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "You don't need to worry about that, Mr. Godwin. The other departments will provide full support.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'In a war that puts the survival of mankind at stake, there will be no shortage of volunteers who are willing to give their lives.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: 'If only they have actually volunteered.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Mr. Godwin, if you really can't handle the stress, we can send someone else to replace you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Godwin', 3: "Don't forget to test the adaptability of Tantalum copolymers in advance. There's no point in running an experiment that is guaranteed to fail.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'No. We need those failures.', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "How about taking this opportunity to find out how to improve the test subject's adaptability of copolymers?", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Failed surgeries are just a common misfortune at this time anyway.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory696.jpg'}
{3: 'After leaving the collapsed area, Lucia and Alpha are walking in a dark corridor.'}
{3: 'Unlike upper levels, there is only one straight passage in this one. All the complex routes have merged together here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'These marks are quite new. They were left by Construct weapons.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha looks at the marks on the corridor walls and quickly comes to a conclusion.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "This is Kurono's important asset. They won't give up that easily.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha has suddenly found an answer to the question that has been haunting her.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Unlike us who came in by coincidence, they should have their own access to the facility.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Their priority must be to recycle the most important asset. That's why there is no trace of them in the upper levels.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You have been distracted since just now. What is it that you want to ask?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Did you say this was where Luna was before she was transferred?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'So they only told you part of the truth... Why am I not surprised.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How is she now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You don't need to know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Unless you need to eliminate a greater threat like "Polyphage", what other reason do you have to be on the same side as her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You came alone without your squad, because you didn't want to get them involved. Am I right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You have made your choice, now live with it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Stop having dreams that will never come true. Leave Luna alone...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Alpha suddenly stops talking. She frowns a little, trying to cast away the noises in her M.I.N.D.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'They really are everywhere.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha thinks of the unexplained irritation earlier and frowns again.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "(It won't change for no reason. Something must be triggering it.)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The gate ahead suddenly opens. A shambling figure appears in front, as if to confirm her thoughts.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Another test subject? No, he's completely infected! Can you control him directly?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'If you want to become an Ascendant faster.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha pulls out her blade and looks at the enemy in front.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Don't let him touch you. It will worsen the Ascension-Network's corruption.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{3: 'It was like a battle horn. The lurking Corrupted begin charging at them.'}
